title: Music Review: Sunny Sweeney's 'Provoked'
teaser: Singer-songwriter Sunny Sweeney's Cinderella story started in a Texas bar, where she was discovered and signed by a Nashville record label. She hit the Billboard charts with her major label debut, but her personal life fell apart in the meantime. Sweeney tells her story on her latest album, Provoked.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
